job_tasks.phrase: Serve as the technical bridge between customer vision and CPQ implementation, crafting tailored solutions that transform business operations and drive efficiency
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand customer requirements (vision) and translate them into technical solutions (CPQ implementation) to achieve business outcomes (transform business operations and drive efficiency).

soft_skills.phrase: crafting tailored solutions that transform business operations and drive efficiency

classification.rationale: The job description is very brief and focuses on business transformation through CPQ implementation, which is not directly related to core AI engineering tasks. It lacks mentions of AI models, generative techniques, or specific AI development frameworks.
